item.description:
Karaoke with DJs Wild Guy (with his harmonica) and Mark the music man. I have also posted karaoke meetups featuring these djs at Nan King. They are a lot of fun.

This is the next to last week of their trial term at AJs.  Let's have a good turn-out to encourage the owners to extend them there.

Pizza is their specialty.

There's a dance floor too!

I'm listing this for multiple meetup groups.

Karaoke starts at 8:30, but because of other commitments I can't guarantee my arrival before 9:00.

Does anyone else want to volunteer to host until I arrive?
item.name: karaoke
